storyInfo: The nightmare that walks the night—The Vampire who kidnaps children to suck their blood is here!

attributes.content: 10:32 P.M. \ Light drizzle
Chernobog - Post-battle Ruins
Hey—Hey! Is anyone here?!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: It's gotten really dark... I just walked past the school, the cake shop, and the tailor shop that Rolena's mom used to run...
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: If I keep going straight, I'll be in the next district.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Dammit... This road is barely walkable. Those nutjobs with the masks... Everything's changed all of a sudden, thanks to them.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yuri! Yuri, where are you?!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: We were together just a moment ago... I was just trying to get us some water that we can drink!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yuri's the youngest, and he's the most hurt. Where could he have gone by himself? Right, his wound was still bleeding... If I look out for the smell of blood... Uhh... It smells like blood everywhere.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Ugh, it stinks.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: No, I can't throw up. It took Oleg so long to find us dinner in the ruins.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yuri—
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
Is that sound coming from behind the wall? A small animal, maybe?  Hmm, probably not. Everything that was alive in this street ran away a long time ago. We're the only ones left.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
There it is again. It doesn't sound like the wind. Could it really be...?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yuri! Yuri, is that you?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: It quieted down. Am I too far away? What was behind the wall again...? The department store's old storeroom?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: The storeroom's been empty the whole time, and the adults would never let us close to it. Oleg even said before that he'd help us sneak inside one day.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Did Yuri come in here by himself? It's so dark... I can't see through the gaps. Dammit, I guess I'm gonna have to climb inside.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: It's even darker in here. My face's all sticky... Is it the rain that dripped in from outside? Urgh, it smells...
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Now I remember... The girls in school said there's something weird inside the storeroom.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: It's gotta be fake.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: But... I've already seen so many weird things going on these past few days...
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: No, don't think about that right now, Anton. Don't be scared. You still need to find Yuri.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
Someone's crying! Someone's crying over on that side! Now I heard it this time!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yuri, is that you?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Anton...? Anton?
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: Yeah, it's me. I'm here. You don't need to be scared no more. I'll climb over there. Give me a second.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Help... Help me...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: Hang in there. I'm almost there. What happened anyway? Why'd you run this far on your own all a sudden?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Isn't your leg hurt...?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Uhh... *Sobs*... T-There was a monster...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: A monster? What are you talking about, Yuri? Do you have a fever?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: A monster... brought me here...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: The monster you're talking about... What does it look like?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: I... I couldn't get a good look... I think it had black claws... And it had red eyes! It stared at me. I-I was so scared, I didn't know what was going on at all.
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: Black claws and red eyes? I think I heard of that before.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Oh yeah, that's the ghost story that Lina from school talked about, right?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yeah... Lina said... She said any kids that don't go to bed at night will get a visit from the monster.
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: It'll keep staring at you, and if your eyes are open and lock onto her red eyes, your soul will get sucked out right away.
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: You'll turn into something like a marionette. You'll climb off your bed with the monster and follow it outside and onto the street. Then you'll keep following it... until you reach its nest.
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: There, the monster will hang you up on the eaves... Just like how we hang sausages at home...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: And when it's hungry... It'll come suck your blood, one mouthful after another until your body's bone dry.
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: *Sobs*... Anton, I can't possibly have...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: Stop it. You're scaring yourself. This is just something the adults made up to get us to go to bed early, I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: Well, think about it. Did it hang you up?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: I... There's something holding my leg... Somewhere up high...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: So... What Lina said's actually real, right?
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: *sobs*... Anton... I don't wanna be eaten by the monster...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: It's okay. I'll be there soon. We just gotta be fast. I'll carry you back before that mon... Before whatever it is comes back.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yeah... N-No... Anton, stay away! Go back!
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: I can see you now, Yuri—
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: What's this?!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.text: A nightmare that walks the night.
A monster who kidnaps children and sucks their blood dry.
They have eyes that glow crimson red.

attributes.content: Ahhhh—!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Got you now.
No... Stay away! Don't come any closer! I... I won't let you hurt Yuri!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Me, hurt him? Boy, what do you think I'm trying to do?
You want to suck his blood, you blood-sucking monster!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Well, it's been a long while since anyone has called me that.
Yes, that's right. I'm a Vampire.
My, my, your reaction's not bad for someone who looks so frail.
But you know, if we're going there, you'll need a bigger brick to throw at me.
I'm a Vampire! We are swift beyond measure, and rank among the mightiest devil races! And have you seen these fangs?
I can easily tear a cystybeast's neck apart.
Holding still? Smart choice.
Monster, let Yuri go. He's hurt, and he's lost a lot of blood. He definitely doesn't have as much blood as I do.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: You can hang me up. When you're hungry, suck my blood.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: No, Anton... Don't do that...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: Very well, since you've found this place.
She's so fast! I can't move my hand...!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Ugh? It hurts!
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: I can't dodge it... Is this how it's like... to get bitten?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: There you go.
There I go...? I'm still standing upright... I don't feel dizzy either...
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Just that bit of blood will do. You are really healthy. It shouldn't leave you with any side effects.
So... Are you gonna take me home... and make me sausage?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Sausage? Is that some Ursus specialty? It sounds nice. If I ever get to come here again after I'm done with this job, maybe I'll give it a try.
Compass? Compass, are you there?
*Cough*, I'm here, Dr. Warfarin.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I'm working so hard, I'm practically sweating blood, and here you are, just standing there, watching the show.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Haha, well, I only just got here. Besides, it looks like you're enjoying yourself.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Doc...tor?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: You mean, this blood-sucking monster is a doctor?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Look at this, Compass. The kids just won't stop calling me a blood-sucking monster. Don't you think I'm like a saint for letting them off with just a little scare?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You're... scaring us?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Let me explain.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Little buddy? I found your friend while I was out on a mission. He was all alone, and it looked like he was hurt pretty bad.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I was worried about his safety, so I brought him here. He was kind of drifting off and passed out halfway through, so I couldn't explain to him what was going on.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin is one of our top doctors. She's very experienced. You can trust her to patch your friend up.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Oh, and you know how she took a bit of your blood just now? She was just taking a blood sample to run some tests.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Tests...?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Okay, the results are out. What's that Ursus saying again? Hmm, this young man is as lively as a wild burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Congratulations, boy. You are not infected yet.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Infected... You mean Oripathy?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: That's right. These days, you're probably one of the luckiest ones around if you're both alive and uninfected in Chernobog.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your friend there isn't quite as lucky.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Is something wrong with Yuri?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: All I can say is we took care of him before it's too late, and you've got me. If Folinic had been in charge of the area, he probably wouldn't have gotten such a wonderful patch up job.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Ahem... If she heard that, I'm sure she'd be mad.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: And what do I care if she's mad? She still has much to learn.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Can she figure out right away where the Originium crystals are building up just going by the changes in the smell of his blood?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: For patients like him, who just started to show symptoms, we need to do more than just take care of their wounds to keep the infection from progressing. We also need to prevent the Originium that's already in their bodies from forming leisons around the wounds.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The suppressants that are out on the market can only alleviate symptoms. Even if I'm on the case, the most I can do is minimize the risk of the disease getting any worse.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Did you hang Yuri's leg up like that to help him?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yeah... I guess? This is an idea I've wanted to try out for a while. In his case, it should be more effective by a few percentage points.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It's so low, I guess it's probably within the margin of error? I might need to find a few more patients to test this out on...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Ahem, Dr. Warfarin, if you keep going, the young gentlemen will start trembling again.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
attributes.name: Scared Child

attributes.content: I get it, you saved us.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: You can thank me later. We need to keep your friend, this Yuri boy, under observation to see how his condition turns out.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: If he actually becomes Infected...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Well, let's not go into that right now.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hey, Anton? You can rest up a little here with Yuri. Once it's bright outside, I'll take you two to our camp.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Your camp?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: That's right. We have a camp here. We'll be pulling out of Chernobog soon. When that happens, we'll escort you two to a nearby Ursus city.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: That is... if Yuri doesn't show any signs of further infection.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: There's Oleg and the others too. There are five of us. We're together.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Is that so? Okay. I'll look for them, then. Dr. Warfarin will give them a checkup too.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: If all of you stay together, your will to live on will be stronger too.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Doctor...?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I have another question...
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Are you... really a blood-sucking monster?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: (Brandishes fangs)
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Makes you want to take a step back, huh? No? What a brave kid.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: To be honest, I have known Dr. Warfarin for a long time, and I know she may seem like she has a few screws loose...
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I heard that.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: *cough*, she's a very skilled doctor. It's just... when you're strapped on the operating table all of a sudden, it does kinda give you chills.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: That's just your instincts at work. I forgive you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It's like sandworms running into a Metal Crab, or some other tiny meatbeasts running into more ferocious beasts. Of course you'd be scared coming face to face with a Vampire.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And you better stay scared. Most Vampires out there aren't nearly as nice as me or Closure.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Ha... Haha.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Hm... Back to our little buddy's question—
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Maybe half-and-half?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Half-and-half?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: My interest in blood doesn't manifest as thirst anymore.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: So... a monster then?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: So you don't get mad... if you're called a monster?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Well... to you, I am a monster, no doubt about that.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I've never wished for you people to treat me as your own kind, and I don't see the other races as my equals either.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And well, if I'm a monster just because I'm unlike the others... then everyone out there can be called a monster too.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: For example, if your friend Yuri actually becomes infected, then a lot of people will call him a monster.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I won't. I won't call him a monster.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: What about the others? It's won't be easy for you to change how they see him.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: If they insist on calling him a monster, I'll fight them off.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: See? You're mad, aren't you?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You'll fight them off, and they'll fight back. Even if nobody dies in all that fighting, it'll be a waste of time, don't you think?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: A waste of time...?
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: Yes, a waste of time. While you're angry, your friend may die of his disease.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: If you take a step back and think it through slowly, you'll find that, instead of being angry, it makes more sense to spend your energy working out more important or meaningful things.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: For you, hm... I suppose that's figuring out how you want to live?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Live... Right, we want to live.
attributes.name: Brave Child

attributes.content: That's right! And if you want to live a better life, you need to learn to accept that you are different and then figure out how to get along with others.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: One more thing, buddy. Once you grow up, be sure to travel to all kinds of places and see what it's like everywhere.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: That way, you will probably come to understand that... being seen as a monster is nothing worth getting angry over.
attributes.name: Warfarin
